text: Please prioritize immediate rollout of consent tracking and one-click opt-out automation to meet CCPA compliance requirements. The deadline for full deployment is 48 hours from now. As part of this rollout, ensure an audit-ready log is maintained for all consent changes, capturing user ID, timestamp, and source IP for each event. Additionally, set up a nightly export of these logs to the designated S3 bucket ccpa-audit-logs, encrypted using AES-256. Please confirm the assigned development owner responsible for this rollout and provide a rollback plan in case any deployment issues arise. Immediate acknowledgment is required.

structured_data.additionalNotes: Urgent rollout to meet CCPA compliance within 48 hours.
One-click user opt-out process for compliance with CCPA.

structured_data.summary: Maintain audit-ready log of consent changes
structured_data.additionalNotes: Log must capture user ID, timestamp, and source IP.

structured_data.summary: Nightly export consent logs to AES-256 encrypted S3 bucket
structured_data.additionalNotes: Logs must be encrypted with AES-256 and stored nightly.

structured_data.summary: Assign development owner for rollout responsibility
structured_data.additionalNotes: origin: implied — Confirmation of dev owner needed for deployment accountability.

structured_data.summary: Provide rollback plan for deployment issues
structured_data.additionalNotes: origin: implied — Deployment contingency plan required in case of failure.
